rawCommands.description:
rawCommands
Run commands, at the exact location of the player

List of Commands (Objects)
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.
rawCommands.x-intellij-html-description:
rawCommands
Run commands, at the exact location of the player

List of Commands (Objects)
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.

commandOffsetX.description:
commandOffsetX
The alt x, usually represents motion if the particle count is zero. Otherwise an offset.

Number
* Default Value is 0.0
* Minimum allowed is -8.0
* Maximum allowed is 8.0

commandRandomAltX

commandAllRandomLocations

Boolean
* Default Value is true

anyOf.description: Represents a time of day (24h time, not 12h am/pm). Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.

startHour.description:
startHour
The beginning hour. Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.

Number
* Default Value is 0.0

anyOf.description: Represents a set of Iris commands
anyOf.x-intellij-html-description: Represents a set of Iris commands

commands.description:
commands
List of commands. Iris replaces {x} {y} and {z} with the location of the entity spawn

List of Text
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.
commands.x-intellij-html-description:
commands
List of commands. Iris replaces {x} {y} and {z} with the location of the entity spawn

List of Text
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.

delay.description:
delay
The delay for running the command. Instant by default

Integer
* Default Value is 0
delay.x-intellij-html-description:
delay
The delay for running the command. Instant by default

Integer
* Default Value is 0

repeat.description:
repeat
If this should be repeated (indefinitely, cannot be cancelled). This does not persist with server-restarts, so it only repeats when the chunk is generated.

Boolean
* Default Value is false
repeat.x-intellij-html-description:
repeat
If this should be repeated (indefinitely, cannot be cancelled). This does not persist with server-restarts, so it only repeats when the chunk is generated.

Boolean
* Default Value is false

repeatDelay.description:
repeatDelay
The delay between repeats, in server ticks (by default 100, so 5 seconds)

Integer
* Default Value is 100
repeatDelay.x-intellij-html-description:
repeatDelay
The delay between repeats, in server ticks (by default 100, so 5 seconds)

Integer
* Default Value is 100

anyOf.description:
timeBlock
The block of 24 hour time in which the command should execute.

TimeBlock (Object)
Represents a time of day (24h time, not 12h am/pm). Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.
    
You can instead specify "snippet/time-block/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)
anyOf.x-intellij-html-description:
timeBlock
The block of 24 hour time in which the command should execute.

TimeBlock (Object)
Represents a time of day (24h time, not 12h am/pm). Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.

You can instead specify "snippet/time-block/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

weather.description:
weather
The weather that is required for the command to execute.

Weather
Represents a weather type
    
* Default Value is ANY
Must be a valid Weather (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

Weather

* Default Value is ANY
